description:
Learning how to effectively communicate with others while choosing the right words can literally make or break your growth in the marketplace.学习如何有效地与他人沟通，懂得选择用词可以成就或者毁掉你在市场上的发展。

Let's take a look at three ways why mastering the skill of communication can improve your business and increase your success rate.让我们来看看良好的沟通技巧是通过哪三种方式来提升你事业和个人的成功概率的。

1. Expand your reach in the marketplace1. 扩大你的市场。

2. Leading and educating employees2. 带领指导员工。

3. The ability to motivate3. 充满动力。

Improving the skill增进技巧

Now that we have listed three ways as to why mastering the skill of communication is so important in determining business success, what are some ways you can improve your communication skills?既然已经列出来掌握沟通技巧对商业是如此重要的三大要素，下面就介绍一些如何提高沟通能力的方法吧。

The first step is to take out a sheet of paper and list what you feel are your strengths, along with where you need to improve. Do you feel you can effectively go out in the marketplace and talk all day and night about your services, but your ability to motivate employees is lacking? Whatever it is, write it down. You can then start to develop a plan of action to increase your communication skills. Here are three ways to get started:首先拿出一张白纸写下对自己的长处和改善之处的感觉。你会觉得你能够得心应手地走出市场，谈论自己的服务，还是觉得自己缺乏推动员工的能力？无论如何，都把它们写下来。然后你就可以开始计划如何提高沟通技巧了。下面有三种方法：

Enrolling in a speaking class is a powerful way to improve communication skills.参加演讲课程是一个强大的提高沟通技巧方法。

Putting a dictionary in the bathroom is another way to slowly but surely increase your vocabulary, which always will help with boosting your skills.在浴室放一本词典，虽然过程缓慢，但确实可以扩大词汇量，还会提升你的技能。

Hiring a speech coach is another route you can look into. Working one on one with an expert can quickly speed up the process.雇佣一位演讲教练也是一个不错的选择。一对一的教学方法可以迅速提高教学效果。
